pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gwyddion is a modular program for SPM data analysis. Primarily it is supposed to be used for analysis of height fields obtained by means of scanning probe microscopy techniques (AFM, MFM, STM, NSOM), but generally it can be used for any other height field analysis or image analysis.

use.flag: Enable FITS image import via sci-libs/cfitsio
Enable JSON data manipulation via dev-libs/jansson
Enable remote control backend via dev-libs/libunique
